com.sitewhere.spi.configuration

Interface ITenantConfigurationResolver


  • public interface ITenantConfigurationResolver
    Pluggable resolver for interacting with global configuration data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] createDefaultTenantConfiguration()
      Create a default configuration for a new tenant.
      byte[] getActiveTenantConfiguration()
      Gets the active configuration for a given tenant.
      java.net.URI getAssetResourcesRoot()
      Get URI for locating asset resources.
      IGlobalConfigurationResolver getGlobalConfigurationResolver()
      Get the global configuration resolver.
      java.net.URI getScriptResourcesRoot()
      Get URI for locating script resources.
      byte[] getStagedTenantConfiguration()
      Gets the staged configuration for a given tenant.
      boolean hasStagedConfiguration()
      Indicates if a staged configuration exists for the tenant.
      boolean hasValidConfiguration()
      Indicates a configuration exists for the tenant.
      void stageTenantConfiguration(byte[] configuration)
      Stage a new tenant configuration.
      void transitionStagedToActiveTenantConfiguration()
      Transition the staged tenant configuration to the active tenant configuration, backing up the active configuration in the process.

      • stageTenantConfiguration

        void stageTenantConfiguration(byte[] configuration)
                       throws com.sitewhere.spi.SiteWhereException
        Stage a new tenant configuration. This stores the new configuration separately from the active configuration. The staged configuration will be made active the next time the tenant is restarted.
        Parameters:
        configuration -
        Throws:
        com.sitewhere.spi.SiteWhereException

      • transitionStagedToActiveTenantConfiguration

        void transitionStagedToActiveTenantConfiguration()
                                          throws com.sitewhere.spi.SiteWhereException
        Transition the staged tenant configuration to the active tenant configuration, backing up the active configuration in the process.
        Throws:
        com.sitewhere.spi.SiteWhereException
